metadata.title: PMâ€™s Coordinator welcomes Samar Haroon Bilour to PML-N

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 09 (APP):Coordinator to the Prime Minister on Information for Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Affairs, Ikhtiar Wali Khan, welcomed Samar Haroon Bilour on joining the Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N). In a post on social media platform X on Wednesday, Ikhtiar Wali Khan stated, "Samar Haroon Bilour welcome in PML-N. The inclusion of the Bilour family will further strengthen the party's position in Peshawar."
